duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and foster a culture of hospitality through exceptional customer experiences and build enduring relationships both internally and externally.
Support all service enhancers to build strong relationships including active use of Concierge.
Achieve sales and service metrics in key measurable areas including: Clienteling/Outreach, Appointment Setting, Talbots Classic Awards etc.
Plan and prioritize tasks and responsibilities to meet the needs of the customer and business.
Seek to understand customer needs & wants with curiosity and confidence through intentional conversation.
Share current products and fashion trends with customers to appropriately wardrobe, inspire and build trust.
Actively participate in community/store activities and events that promote the Talbots Professionally represent the brand.
Act as an in-store expert with a deep understanding of the merchandise to guide and ensure the customer finds the best wardrobe fit for their personal style and body type.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate’s or Bachelor’s Degree preferred)
